@reappropriate The same thing happened to me in LA - it’s why I started the #becool2asians campaign. We’ve also coordinated a directory of mostly AAPI therapists who have volunteered free therapy for those affected by anti-Asian hate (or any other racism) Pls retweet so we can be of service! https://t.co/qgib8PGTkd

Pls retweet to help us be of service #becool2asians is offering free mental health services to frontline healthcare workers. We need to take care of the folks who are risking their lives to save ours. https://t.co/AIP510VIlG

My friend is of Romanian Armenian descent. His fiancé is from Japan. They stopped at a gas station. She asked for the bathroom key and was told it was out of order. His mom then went and asked and was given the key.  #BeCool2Asians @originalspin @angryasianman @APAMCommittee
